name: @ovhcloud/ods-theme-blue-jeans
description: Blue Jeans theme, containing color variables & fonts

scripts.generate:theme: node-sass --importer ../../../node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js theme/ -o dist && node-sass --importer ../../../node_modules/node-sass-package-importer/dist/cli.js fonts/index.scss dist/fonts.css
scripts.build:sass:prefix: yarn run generate:theme && yarn run generate:prefix
